verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
So I'm waiting for another time and another place
Where all my hopes and dreams will be capture with one look
at Jesus' face

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines: Oh! my hearts been burnin' my soul keeps yearnin'

verse.name: c1c
verse.lines:
Sometimes I can't hardly wait for that sweey someday when I'll be swept away
to another time and another place

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
I've always heard there is a land beyond
Where every tear will be left behind mortal dreams of man
But it must be in another time

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Oh!
There'll be an everlasting light
shining a purest holy white
And every fear will be erased but it must be in another place
Oh! be in another place Oh!

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
I've grown so tired of earthly things they promise
All of kife's sweetest joys combined peace but furnish pain
could never match those in another time.

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
Oh! And though I've put my trust in Christ and felt His Spirit moved in my life
I know it's truly just a taste of His glory in another place Oh!
